dmca.title: [ABUSE] Cease and Desist Notification
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, January 20, 2006 10:05 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Cease and Desist Notification

This message was received at abuse@theplanet.com on Thursday, January 19,
2006 at
10:18:51 PM and concerns a matter for which responsibility is delegated to
your team. The message and headers follow.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

SUBJECT:
[ABUSE] Cease and Desist Notification

MESSAGE BODY:
    I have made several requests to www.supload.com and www.peachyforum.com
via email AND their own submission pages.  I have copyrighted material that
is being illegally hosted and I want it removed.



    As you neither asked for nor paid to use the Work as the basis for your
Work, nor to make or distribute copies, including electronic copies, of same
I believe you have willfully infringed my rights under 17 U.S.C. Section
101 et seq. and could be liable for statutory damages as high as $150,000 as
set forth in Section 504(c)(2) therein.

    I demand that you immediately cease the use and distribution of all
infringing works derived from the Work, and all copies, including electronic
copies, of same, that you deliver to me, if applicable, all unused,
undistributed copies of same, or destroy such copies immediately and that
you desist from this or any other infringement of my rights in the future.

    If I have not received an affirmative response from you by January 20,
2006 indicating that you have fully complied with these requirements,
otherwise I shall take further action against you.

    The following is a list of URL's to the material:

http://www.supload.com/free/1-854976.jpg/view/

http://www.supload.com/free/2-251123.jpg/view/

http://www.supload.com/free/3-965600.jpg/view/

http://www.supload.com/free/4-329138.jpg/view/

http://www.supload.com/free/5-313246.jpg/view/

http://www.supload.com/free/6-670333.jpg/view/

http://www.supload.com/free/7-92744.jpg/view/

http://www.supload.com/free/8-148153.jpg/view/

http://www.supload.com/free/9-458314.jpg/view/

http://www.supload.com/free/10-878892.jpg/view/

http://www.supload.com/free/15-309277.jpg/view/

http://www.supload.com/free/1-113404.jpg/view/

http://www.supload.com/free/2-489304.jpg/view/

http://www.supload.com/free/3-279576.jpg/view/

http://www.supload.com/free/4-773141.jpg/view/

http://www.supload.com/free/5-359636.jpg/view/

http://www.supload.com/free/6-57780.jpg/view/

http://www.supload.com/free/7-975328.jpg/view/

http://www.supload.com/free/8-2590.jpg/view/

http://www.supload.com/free/9-373619.jpg/view/

http://www.supload.com/free/10-907381.jpg/view/

http://www.supload.com/free/11-478056.jpg/view/

http://www.supload.com/free/12-62629.jpg/view/

http://www.supload.com/free/13-625989.jpg/view/

http://www.supload.com/free/14-409633.jpg/view/

http://www.supload.com/free/15-786354.jpg/view/

    I have requested to peachyforum.com to stop posting my material but
still have an active thread there.

http://www.peachyforum.com/forums/190428/ShowPost.aspx

    Thank you,

Callista
